channel.title: Help plz [starter]
channel.description:
some of my weapons are not working some how plz tell me how to fix them
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/495/keyblade.jpg[/img] [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/465/dawnofwarchainsaw2.jpg[/img]
those are the one's that dont work
and how do you get your weapon to hit becasue my weapon dont hit it just goses for fist plz help me
thankyou :)

item.title: Help plz [starter]
item.dc:creator: @reed789 reed789
item.description:
@reed789 wrote:

Thank you guys i got my weapon to work SilentCJ im just going to test the attack on my weapon
;)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2009, 05:47:12 am[/size][hr]SilentCJ can you send me a example of it so i know what to do thank you

item.title: Help plz [starter]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Took me 2 and a half hours to do that lol.
I started from a basic standing up character model, and a basic cow, and then just modeled them into that shape, was quite a fun little project.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz [starter]
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:4, topic:271640”]Yeh, it needs triangulating.

And about the in game attacking, that is server sided.

If you search the id for a dragon long in client.java in your server folder, it will show a bunch of animations for specials, walking, standing, blocking, etc.
Basically, if you just clone all the dragon longsword bits of code and then change the item id, it will then attack like a dragon longsword and there will be a special attack.[/quote]
Rofl, nice cow pics

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz [starter]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Yeh, it needs triangulating.

And about the in game attacking, that is server sided.

If you search the id for a dragon long in client.java in your server folder, it will show a bunch of animations for specials, walking, standing, blocking, etc.
Basically, if you just clone all the dragon longsword bits of code and then change the item id, it will then attack like a dragon longsword and there will be a special attack.

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz [starter]
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Press [ctrl]+[a] then press the select button up top of metasoquioa and press “Triangulate selected faces”.

Read full topic
